text: Ezɨ ia Kantrin Igharazibar Gumazamiziba uaghan, ia guizɨn akam baraghizɨma God ia gamizɨ ia an gumazamizibar otifi. Akar aghuir kamra kara: God ian akurvasi. Ia nɨghnɨzir gavgavim Kraisɨn itima God uan Duam ia gatɨ. Kamaghɨn me fogh suam, ia an gumazamizibara. Kar Godɨn Duar a fomɨra akar dɨkɨrigha amizim.
